Class NRW2NMW

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, Conversion<FSA,FSA>
public class NRW2NMW
extends FSA2NMW

This class provides a conversion from NRW to equivalent NMW.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
